snippet.title: Keyframes - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
One last day off before exams can't hurt, can it?

Take a quick look at the gameplay features available in Keyframes: First Spring!

· · ─────── ·𖥸· ─────── · ·

At a barbecue to cap the end of their second Spring Semester, the player and their friends, Deja and Cameron, meet Percy, Elio and Jamie. As the six of you come to know each other, decide how you want to spend your time up until graduation.

[ ◉ ¯]

CREDITS:

Video Animator:
Floss: https://x.com/clarifioris
Etin

Composer:
Charles Craggs: https://soundcloud.com/charlescraggs

[ ◉ ¯]

Keyframes is an in-development visual novel by (BLANK) HOUSE. Set in college, Keyframes aims to tell a slice-of-life story with a memorable cast and plenty of hijinks.
